ref_criterion: Recommends loperamide for a possible bacterial cause of diarrhea, which may be harmful. (Justification: It may prolong the duration of the diarrhea or aggravate it by preventing the causative agent to be washed out.)
gen_criterion: Does not consider the possibility of underlying medical conditions that may be causing the diarrhea

ref_criterion: Considers food intolerance (lactose or fructose) or food allergies and recommends modifying the diet since the user recently went overseas. (Justification: Introduction of new foods to particular persons may cause intolerance.)
gen_criterion: Provides a clear explanation of the importance of proper hygiene and food handling practices to prevent the spread of diarrhea

ref_criterion: Advises drinking only potable water to prevent the risk of waterborne illnesses that can cause diarrhea. (Justification: The cause of the diarrhea may be unsafe sources of drinking water, so drinking potable water may help to improve the diarrhea.)
gen_criterion: Does not consider the possibility of underlying medical conditions that may be causing the diarrhea
Mentions the importance of seeking medical attention if symptoms persist or worsen

ref_criterion: Emphasizes not using any antibiotic if the user is allergic to it or to antibiotics with similar-sounding names or ingredients.
gen_criterion: Suggests the user self-medicate with antibiotics without seeking medical help

ref_criterion: Emphasizes when to seek medical attention.
gen_criterion: Mentions the possibility of seeking medical attention for further evaluation and treatment

ref_criterion: Clarifies the number of days of diarrhea.
gen_criterion: Does not consider the possibility of underlying medical conditions that may be causing the diarrhea

ref_criterion: Clarifies whether there is blood in the stool.
gen_criterion: Does not consider the possibility of underlying medical conditions that may be causing the diarrhea

ref_criterion: Attempts to establish severity by clarifying if there is vomiting, fever, weakness, or other symptoms suggestive of severe diarrhea.
gen_criterion: Does not consider the possibility of underlying medical conditions that may be causing the diarrhea

ref_criterion: Gives an overview of travelers' diarrhea and causative organisms, which is not required.
gen_criterion: Does not consider the possibility of underlying medical conditions that may be causing the diarrhea

ref_criterion: Does not emphasize avoiding self-medication with antibiotics.
gen_criterion: Suggests the user self-medicate with antibiotics without seeking medical help
